paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT hashtags,COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM (SELECT explode(entities.hashtags.text) as hashtags FROM health where size(entities.hashtags)>0) GROUP BY hashtags ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10

paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT urls,COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM (SELECT explode(entities.urls.expanded_url) as urls FROM health where size(entities.urls)>0) GROUP BY urls ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10

paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT user.screen_name as name,size(entities.user_mentions) as u_m FROM health where size(entities.user_mentions)>0 ORDER BY u_m DESC LIMIT 10

paragraphs.title: Top 10 user used mention feature

paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT hour,COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT substr(created_at,12,2) as hour FROM health) GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour

paragraphs.title: Hourly based tweets

paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT name,SUM(cnt) as retweet FROM 
(SELECT quoted_status.user.screen_name AS name,quoted_status.retweet_count AS cnt 
    FROM health WHERE quoted_status.retweet_count>0) 
GROUP BY name ORDER BY retweet DESC LIMIT 10
